name: Chinese Pinyin Trainer Lite
description: Master the sounds of Mandarin Chinese with ease!  No matter if youre a beginner or a long-time student of Chinese, its tonal nature can catch you out and even cause some serious embarrassment...  Pinyin Trainer will help you master those tones using Pinyin, the standard romanization system for Mandarin Chinese. With almost 2,000 individual audio recordings and a variety of question-and-answer methods, itll keep you on your toes and improve your Chinese listening skills like nothing else. Plus, its got a complete guide to reading Chinese with the Pinyin system built right in.  Features:   Score by tapping the words that you hear    Train both Chinese tones and Pinyin initials sounds, to help you distinguish between commonly-confused words   Integrates with our Chinese-English dictionary to provide potential definitions for Pinyin words   In tone sketching mode, answer tone questions by drawing Pinyin tones with your fingers!   Almost 2,000 high quality original audio recordings   Free guide to reading Pinyin, with a complete index of one-syllable Chinese sounds
